title: QA-gone, PREPLANNED Vacay 7.23.20
itunes:title: QA-gone, PREPLANNED Vacay 7.23.20
description:
In episode 678, Jack and Miles are joined by the Forgotten: Women of Juárez's co-host Mónica Ortiz Uribe to discuss the Republicans lack of a Covid-19 bill, Twitter banning QAnon, Trump sending Ghislaine Maxwell his best wishes, Tucker Carlson's many issues, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. 'What in the hell are we doing?' Senate Republicans clash over coronavirus relief
  2. The Hill's Morning Report - Presented by Facebook - Dems to GOP: Where is your COVID-19 bill?
  3. Twitter Is Finally Going After QAnon
  4. Trump says he wishes accused sex trafficker Ghislaine Maxwell well and has 'met her numerous times'
  5. Tucker Carlson's top writer resigns after secretly posting racist and sexist remarks in online forum
  6. Tucker Carlson Attacks “Ghouls” Over Fired Fox News Writer Blake Neff’s “Wrong” Racist Online Posts, Announces Vacation
  7. Tucker Carlson to Take ‘Long-Planned’ Vacation After Writer’s Resignation
  8. Tucker’s Got Real Scandals, So He Keeps Inventing Imaginary Enemies
  9. Fox News, Ed Henry, Sean Hannity & Tucker Carlson Sued In Sex Trafficking, Sexual Harassment & Retaliation Suit
  10. Tucker Carlson claimed the New York Times planned to expose his address. Then his fans doxed the reporter.
  11. WATCH: Daringer - Gold 97s

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
